video.title: Ghost Adventures Collection
video.synopsis: An intrepid team of paranormal investigators sets out to research and experience the most terrifying haunted places in the world.

episodes.synopsis: The team visits a Civil War-era orphanage and the Jennie Wade House -- site of the only civilian death during the battle -- in Gettysburg, Penn.
episodes.title: Gettysburg

episodes.synopsis: At the Maysville Slave House in Kentucky, the guys attempt to comfort the restless spirits of slaves once tortured and killed in the house's basement.
episodes.title: Kentucky Slave House

episodes.synopsis: Nick, Aaron and Zak look for the aggressive spirits haunting Utah's Tooele Hospital, where one of the specters calls out Zak's name.
episodes.title: Tooele Hospital

episodes.synopsis: In Ashmore, Illinois, Aaron, Zak and Nick check out a former almshouse and psychiatric hospital that is infested with malicious spirits.
episodes.title: Ashmore Estates

episodes.synopsis: The team collects evidence at California's Winchester Mystery House, but drastic decisions must be made when Aaron's behavior mysteriously changes.
episodes.title: Winchester Mystery House

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Zak experience a mysterious aggression when the team investigates the infamous Lizzie Borden House in Fall River, Massachusetts.
episodes.title: Lizze Borden House

episodes.synopsis: Deep beneath Portland, Oregon, run the Shanghai Tunnels, where Zak, Aaron and Nick capture visual evidence of spirits haunting a local restaurant.
episodes.title: Shanghai Tunnels

episodes.synopsis: Aaron, Nick and Zak help a friend and his family communicate with their daughter, who was killed in a tragic car accident seven years before.
episodes.title: Tha Galka Family

episodes.synopsis: Aaron, Nick and Zak head to a Chicago nightclub where hundreds died in a fire -- and where a mysterious force shoves Zak down a set of stairs.
episodes.title: Excalibur Nightclub

episodes.synopsis: The guys spot a mysterious figure at Tor House, home of a poet who predicted that he would communicate with the living 50 years after his death.
episodes.title: Tor House

episodes.synopsis: Along a shipwreck-strewn stretch of California coastline, the guys investigate a lighthouse and spot a mysterious figure.
episodes.title: Point Sur Lighthouse

episodes.synopsis: In Mineral Wells, Texas, the guys investigate the link between hauntings in a hotel and the town's mineral water -- called "crazy water" by locals.
episodes.title: Crazy Town

episodes.synopsis: Joined by a network news crew, Nick, Aaron and Zak check out a haunting at a harbor in Staten Island, New York, where they detect cryptic noises.
episodes.title: Sailor's Snug Harbor

episodes.synopsis: Nick comes under attack when the team checks out a malicious spirit that haunts a century-old San Francisco strip club.
episodes.title: Market Street Cinema

episodes.synopsis: Actress Brit Morgan and singer Mimi Page join the guys for a séance and tarot card reading in California's historic Glen Tavern Inn.
episodes.title: Glen Tavern Inn

episodes.synopsis: Guest investigator Lady Snake helps the team re-create pagan rituals at Hellfire Caves near London to summon the spirits of 18th-century royalty.
episodes.title: Hellfire Caves

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the historic Black Swan Inn in San Antonio, Aaron, Nick and Zak observe a spirit communicating with the inn's owner.
episodes.title: Black Swan Inn

episodes.synopsis: In Jefferson City, Missouri, Nick, Aaron and Zak investigate the grim halls and gas chamber of the notorious Missouri State Penitentiary.
episodes.title: Missouri State Penitentiary

episodes.synopsis: In California, Zak and Aaron witness a spirit attempt to operate on Nick inside a derelict hospital founded during the Gold Rush.
episodes.title: Tuolumne Hospital

episodes.synopsis: When Zak spots an apparition with beaming red eyes at America's most famous prison, Alcatraz, the guys hope to escape the Rock in one piece.
episodes.title: Alcatraz

episodes.synopsis: On a trip to Romania, the guys visit the castle of the notorious Vlad the Impaler and a woodland clearing associated with extraterrestrial activity.
episodes.title: Romania: Targoviste Castle and Hoia-Baciu Forest

episodes.synopsis: In Romania, Nick, Zak and Aaron investigate Hunedoara Castle and visit the cell where Vlad the Impaler, aka Dracula, was once imprisoned.
episodes.title: Romania: Hunedoara Castle

episodes.synopsis: Near St. Louis, Zak, Nick and Aaron visit the Exorcist House, site of a demonic possession that inspired the film "The Exorcist."
episodes.title: The Exorcist House

episodes.synopsis: The team revisits their most memorable underground investigations, including those in Oregon's Shanghai Tunnels and in England's Hellfire Caves.
episodes.title: Dungeons & Demons

episodes.synopsis: Nick, Zak and Aaron reflect on the most disturbing international investigations they've conducted, including some in Jamaica, Canada and England.
episodes.title: Passport to Hell
